content:
Q: Can I extend my travel insurance coverage if my trip is extended?
A: Yes. This is subject to our underwriter’s approval. You can call or email us before the policy expires. If you’re wondering where to buy travel insurance for extended trips, you can easily do so through our website or contact our customer support at 6702 0202 for assistance.
questions: How can I extend my travel insurance if my trip duration increases?
Is it possible to get approval for extending travel insurance coverage?
What steps should I take to extend my travel insurance before it expires?
Who should I contact to extend my travel insurance coverage?
Can I purchase extended travel insurance directly through the website?
What is the contact number for customer support to discuss travel insurance extension?
Are there any specific conditions under which travel insurance extension is approved?
Where can I find more information about extending my travel insurance policy?
Is email communication available for extending travel insurance coverage?
What are the options for buying travel insurance for extended trips?
